<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>false</active><api_name>x_1108343_hr.RecordResolver</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>RecordResolver</name><script><![CDATA[var RecordResolver = Class.create();
RecordResolver.prototype = {
    resolveRecord: function() {
        var gr = new GlideRecord('x_1108343_hr_human_resource');
        if (gr.get(current.sys_id)) {
            gr.state = 'Resolved';
            gr.update();
        }
    }
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-04-19 20:40:37</sys_created_on><sys_id>6f2d852f97698210af13f6fce053af36</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>RecordResolver</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Human Resource" source="x_1108343_hr">b499122797910210af13f6fce053afa4</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Human Resource">b499122797910210af13f6fce053afa4</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_6f2d852f97698210af13f6fce053af36</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-04-19 21:23:47</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
